Posts.Content: Jan 16, 2019 05:22PM Stephanie980 wrote: this just happened to me . my Birad was 5 but my core biopsy was benign. i had this deep unsettling feeling something was not right. told my primary doctor i wanted this thing out of me. saw breast surgeon on Dec 27th, mass removed on Jan 2, he called Jan 9 told me i had DCIS grade 3. my mass is 8.7cm big. Good luck. i pray that your case is benign.
Posts.Title: Got my US report back - BIRADS 4c SarBar22 Natasha007
